svg.text: संदेश डाइजेस्ट और हैशिंग एल्गोरिदम (MD5 & SHA Family)

text.style: font-family: Arial; font-size: 12px; font-weight: bold; fill: white; text-anchor: middle;

svg.text: • Different construction (sponge function) • Latest standard (2015) • Quantum-resistant design

svg.text: Given hash h, hard to find x such that H(x) = h

text.style: font-family: Arial; font-size: 13px; font-weight: bold; fill: white;

svg.text: Given x₁, hard to find x₂ ≠ x₁ such that H(x₁) = H(x₂)

text.style: font-family: Arial; font-size: 13px; font-weight: bold; fill: white;

svg.text: Hard to find any x₁, x₂ where H(x₁) = H(x₂)

text.style: font-family: Arial; font-size: 13px; font-weight: bold; fill: white;

svg.text: Small input change → large output change

text.style: font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 11px; fill: white;
font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 11px; fill: white;

svg.text: md5_hash = hashlib.md5(b"Hello World").hexdigest() # ⚠️ Don't use in production

text.style: font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 11px; fill: white;

svg.text: # Use SHA-256 or SHA-3 for new applications
Hash functions are fundamental building blocks of modern cryptographic systems
